name: hemmelig
description: Hemmelig is a self hosted secret sharing application for sending encrypted notes that expire after viewing or a set time. It is useful for delivering passwords or confidential messages without leaving data on third party services.
features: Encrypted Sharing: Share secrets with end-to-end encryption for maximum security.
Auto-Expiration: Set secrets to expire after being viewed once or after a time limit.
Password Protection: Add an additional password layer for extra security on sensitive secrets.
Burn After Reading: Secrets are automatically deleted after the first view.
No Registration: Share secrets without requiring recipients to create accounts.
Audit Trail: Track when secrets were created and accessed for accountability.
Custom Expiry: Set flexible expiration times from minutes to days.
Self-Hosted Security: Keep sensitive data on your own infrastructure without third-party access.
